scripts.watch: rimraf build && mkdirp build && watchify src/app.js -d -o build/bundle.js -v [ babelify --presets [env] ]
scripts.debug: rimraf build && mkdirp build && browserify src/app.js -d  -t [ babelify --presets env ] -o build/bundle.js
scripts.build: rimraf build && mkdirp build && browserify src/app.js -t [ babelify --presets env ] | uglifyjs -mco build/bundle.js
